metadata.title: CVE-2023-23602 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A mishandled security check when creating a WebSocket in a WebWorker causedthe Content Security Policy connect-src header to be ignored. This couldlead to connections to restricted origins from inside WebWorkers. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 109, Thunderbird < 102.7, and Firefox ESR <102.7.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
